attributes.action: Send an aircraft carrier battle group to the Red Sea to defeat the Sudanese military
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Sudanese regime keeps killing Darfurians despite the Prime Minister's article, and despite the UN resolution about the UN-AU joint force. It is therefore necessary to eliminate the Sudanese military, and to avoid casualties, this should be done by the Fleet Air Arm. It is necessary to eliminate the Sudanese Air Force, which keeps bombing Darfur, and the Sudanese Army, or else they will keep breaching the embargo, buying weapons and killing Darfurians. They have already killed 200000 people.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
